pages.text: Welcome to Real Filing Reborn, a mod that allows you to store vast quantities of items in an organized filing system.$(br2)This guide will walk you through all aspects of the mod, from basic storage to advanced networked systems.
Real Filing Reborn offers:$(li)Storage of up to $(#00AA00)2 billion$() of a single item type in folders$(li)Special folders for unique items$(li)Networking cabinets together with the Filing Index
